alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 05 at 9:01AM AKST until December 05 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW EVENT CONTINUES FOR THE NORTHERN HIGHWAYS... .A Gale-force low in the Gulf of Alaska is bringing precipitation to the Panhandle. Snow accumuluted all night along a good portion of the length of the Haines Highway and above a few hundred feet on the Klondike Highway. The snow is expected to continue through the morning with areas away from Lynn Canal seeing snow accumulation. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Klondike Highway, Haines Highway, and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow has changed to rain in the Haines area and is starting move northward along the Haines Highway. For the Haines and Klondike Highways, Heavy snow is expected to last through Tuesday morning. Reports range from 8.5 inches last evening in Haines, before the transition to rain, and 17.0 inches at the Customs Station.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
